| HistoryText             = 
===Origin===
Grigori were [[Angels (Monotheism)|Angels]] originally tasked by [[God]] to protect humanity but later went rogue and remained on [[Earth]].{{r|Marvel Zombies: The Book of Angels, Demons & Various Monstrosities #1|; [[Angels (Monotheism)|Angels]]' entry}} They were led by [[Sariel (Earth-616)|Sariel]].{{r|Punisher Vol 4 3}}

===Corruption===
...<!--  corruption of Sariel, Azazel, Armaros, Ezekeel{{r|Punisher Vol 4 3}} -->

[[Esphares (Earth-616)|Esphares]], [[Tariel (Earth-616)|Tariel]] and [[Hafaza (Earth-616)|Hafaza]] way to corruption is unknown.

===Gadriel's joining===
After teaching mankind to make weapons, [[Gadriel (Grigori) (Earth-616)|Gadriel]] was demoted to the Grigori. At that assignment, he fell to lust and alcohol and rejoined his fellow Grigori in exile.{{r|Marvel Zombies: The Book of Angels, Demons & Various Monstrosities #1|; [[Angels (Monotheism)|Angels]]' entry}}<!-- 

Gadriel corruption by booze and women{{r|Punisher Vol 4 3}}
